label: usedCoordinateReferenceSystem
comment: The CS (Coordinate System) engineering coordinate reference system used for this geographical coordinate.
The CS (Coordinate System) engineering coordinate reference system used for this specified geographical feature.

rangeIncludes.comment: A coordinate reference system that is used in a contextually local sense to describe the relative locations of objects in which coordinates of points are recorded in a Coordinate System (CS) (reference ISO 19111).

domainIncludes.comment: A set of geographical coordinates of a specific point such as the longitude, latitude and altitude.
Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
